text: Yao Yan (; born 9 December 1974) is a retired Chinese badminton player from Nanning, Guangxi. She competed at the 1996 Summer Olympics. == Achievements == === Asian Championships === Women's singles {| class="sortable wikitable" style="font-size: 90%;" ! Year ! Venue ! Opponent ! Score !
